lines.text: DUMMY
let a , b , c and d be integers
read a , b , c and d
if a is greater than b , swap ( a , b )
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap ( b , c )
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if c is greater than d , swap ( c , d )
lines.code: if ( c > d ) swap ( c , d ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap ( a , b )
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap ( b , c )
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap ( c , d )
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if a + b > c or b + c > d
lines.code: if ( a + b > c || b + c > d )

lines.text: print " TRIANGLE " and a new line
else
if a + b = c | | b + c = d
lines.code: if ( a + b == c || b + c == d )

lines.text: print " SEGMENT " and a new line
else
print " IMPOSSIBLE " and a new line
